body:
I noticed that the latest [temporal.io](http://temporal.io/) server is still using deprecated library “gopkg.in/go-jose/go-jose.v2 v2.6.3” (in go.mod). It could be replace by the library [GitHub - go-jose/go-jose: An implementation of JOSE standards (JWE, JWS, JWT) in Go](https://github.com/go-jose/go-jose) withouth code reworking.

Thanks In advance
Regards
Marco

comments.body:
Have you got update about this issue?
The go-jose/go-jose module is vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2c7c-3mj9-8fqh

Thanks
Regards

title: gopkg.in/go-jose/go-jose.v2 v2.6.3 is deprecated
